name: Flowcubes
description:
Have you ever been led to a dead end by your phone and thought you can do it better? With FLOWCUBES you are in control of the path. Lead the people to their destination and make sure they make it there. Place and combine flow fields to generate a world with a perfect path from A to B.

With FLOWCUBES you get:
  • A brand new puzzle mechanic not used before
  • Hand designed levels with unique environments
  • A combinatorial logic puzzle that makes you think in vectors
